notes: Furman & Stern (2011), study of Biological Resource Center (BRC) deposits on article citations. Article-year panel with negative binomial FE, comparing BRC-linked articles to matched controls before vs after deposit. Treatment variable post_brc indicates post-deposit period. Key tables: Table 4 (age profile robustness), Table 5 (substitution test). Core sample: sample3==1 (BRC-linked articles + matched controls, window period). Uses bootstrap SE throughout.

design_audit.notes: Conditional fixed-effects negative binomial regression (xtnbreg, fe). Treatment is post_brc (post-deposit indicator). Age and year dummies (30 age dummies + ~22 year dummies) absorb flexible time/lifecycle trends. Bootstrap SE (Stata default). IRR (incidence rate ratio) reported.

claim_object.outcome_concept: Annual citation count to a scientific article
claim_object.treatment_concept: BRC deposit of biological materials linked to the article (post_brc = 1 after deposit)
claim_object.estimand_concept: ATT of BRC deposit on citation flow, estimated via conditional FE negative binomial DiD comparing BRC-linked articles to matched controls
claim_object.target_population: BRC-linked articles and matched control articles in biological sciences (sample3==1)

baseline_specs.label: Table4-Col1
baseline_specs.notes: xtnbreg cites window post_brc age_brc1 $age1 $year1, irr fe i(rart_num) vce(bootstrap). 'window' is the time-window indicator, age_brc1 is BRC-specific age interaction, $age1 has 30 age dummies, $year1 has ~22 year dummies.

constraints.functional_form_policy: The paper uses negative binomial throughout. Poisson FE and OLS on log(cites+1) are meaningful alternatives. Coefficients from nbreg/Poisson are IRRs; OLS on logs gives semi-elasticity.
constraints.notes: Age and year dummies are mandatory (the paper always includes full sets). The only variable controls are window, age_brc1, and post_brc_yrs. These are identity-defining rather than optional, so LOO is limited to these few substantive regressors.

canonical.notes: Bootstrap SE matching the paper's vce(bootstrap). Default Stata bootstrap reps.

variants.notes: Cluster-robust SE at the article level.

budgets.notes: Limited control variation (age/year dummies are mandatory). Most variation comes from functional form, sample, and FE axes.

sampling.notes: Only 3-4 substantive control variations beyond mandatory age/year dummies. Full enumeration is trivial.

diagnostics_plan.linkage: Figure 2 in paper: pre_dep2-pre_dep17 post_dep2-post_dep20 event study coefficients
diagnostics_plan.notes: The paper's Figure 2 provides a pre-trends check using year-by-year pre-deposit and post-deposit coefficients.
